Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, clean hotel, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: EssexGirl02
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights clean modern decoration value location excellent flat screen tv air con telephone nice bathroom 5 minute walk espanya metro equal distance las ramblas camp half hour walk easy ride metro staff spoke english barca welcoming efficient helpful recommend hotel visits barcelona definately returning hotel offered food didnt try plenty bars restaurants surrounding

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings - good hotel but with issues”
Reviews.Author: iwyswug
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel chose reading postive reviews site starting postives hotel located quieter barcelona previous visit stayed main ramlas noise didnt stop 24 7 hotel quiet walking distance main underground lines local neighbourhood meant cheaper bars eat handy didnt breakfast included hotel staff spoke english alway helpful clean bedroom tv size bathroom main issues reviews dreaded courtyard meant outside light air pitch black stuffy set alarm completely black 10am door slamming impossible close door slamming throughout night nights sleep difficult dark bit dampener otherwise pleasant hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good, Very clean & friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: Southshields_DAVE
Reviews.Content: hotel location travelling barcelona air 10 mins walk main train station barcelona estacio sants renfe train direct airport terminal 2 barcelona sants train takes 20 mins 300 euros yes reviews hotel city 25 mins walk main tourist las ramblas de gracia placa de catalunya etc reflects favourable online rates walk city pleasant main road stacks bars cafes eateries etc rocafort metro station 2 blocks approx 5 mins walk 3 stops main city metro catalunya 240 euros ticket 600 euros unlimited travel day sweep tourist sites metros run hotel city font olympic stadium 10 mins walk overall clean friendly competitive online rates reccomended definately stay barcelona
